sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( PKCL_CORP_CODE ,PKCL_COME_CODE ,PKCL_TABL_ID ,PKCL_COLM_ID ,PKCL_SORT_NUMB ,PKCL_COLM_NAME ,PKCL_DATA_TYPE ,PKCL_DATA_LENG ,PKCL_COLM_ALGN ,PKCL_WITH_SCRN ,PKCL_DISP_ALLW ,PKCL_UPDT_DATE ,PKCL_UPDT_CMAN ,PKCL_INIT_DATE ,PKCL_INIT_CMAN ) AS ( SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_CORP_CODE', 1, '법인코드', 'VARCHAR', '4', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_STND_GUBN', 2, '표준구분', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '40', 'Y', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_STND_DEGR', 3, '개정차수 ', 'VARCHAR', '10', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_SEQ0' , 4, 'SEQ', 'NUMBER', '5', 'R', '60', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEMPK', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_HOSE_CODE', 5, 'HOSE 종류', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'C', '140', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_SHAP_GRP2', 6, '제품형상분류1', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_IN00_MIN0', 7, '압출내경 MIN', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_IN00_MAX0', 8, '압출내경 MAX', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_OUT0_MIN0', 9, '압출외경 MIN', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_OUT0_MAX0', 10, '압출외경 MAX', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_TOTL_MIN0', 11, '곡HOSE 길이 MIN', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_TOTL_MAX0', 12, '곡HOSE 길이 MAX', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_LNG0_PRIC', 13, '가스비', 'NUMBER', '14,6', 'R', '100', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_MATL_UNIT', 14, '단위', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_APPL_GUBN', 15, '적용여부', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '40', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_REMK_0001', 16, 'REMARK', 'VARCHAR', '200', 'L', '200', 'Y', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_UPDT_CMAN', 17, '수정자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_UPDT_DATE', 18, '수정일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_INIT_CMAN', 19, '등록자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSL', 'HOSL_INIT_DATE', 20, '등록일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240506 12:19:36', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CREATED_YN ,CASE WHEN C.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END COMMENTS_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE >= A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END UPDATED_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE > D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_COLM_ALGN != D.PKCL_COLM_ALGN THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_WITH_SCRN != D.PKCL_WITH_SCRN THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_SORT_NUMB != D.PKCL_SORT_NUMB THEN 'U' ELSE 'X' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS C ON C.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND C.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBPKCL D ON D.PKCL_CORP_CODE = A.PKCL_CORP_CODE AND D.PKCL_COME_CODE = A.PKCL_COME_CODE AND D.PKCL_TABL_ID = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND D.PKCL_COLM_ID = A.PKCL_COLM_ID ORDER BY A.PKCL_SORT_NUMB

CREATE TABLE CATBHOSL ( HOSL_CORP_CODE VARCHAR2(4) ,HOSL_STND_GUBN CHAR(1) ,HOSL_STND_DEGR VARCHAR2(10) ,HOSL_SEQ0 NUMBER(5, 0) ,HOSL_HOSE_CODE VARCHAR(8) ,HOSL_SHAP_GRP2 VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSL_IN00_MIN0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSL_IN00_MAX0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSL_OUT0_MIN0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSL_OUT0_MAX0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSL_TOTL_MIN0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSL_TOTL_MAX0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSL_LNG0_PRIC NUMBER(14, 6) ,HOSL_MATL_UNIT VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSL_APPL_GUBN CHAR(1) ,HOSL_REMK_0001 VARCHAR2(200) ,HOSL_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSL_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSL_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSL_INIT_DATE VARCHAR2(8) ,CONSTRAINT CATBHOSL_PK PRIMARY KEY( HOSL_CORP_CODE ,HOSL_STND_GUBN ,HOSL_STND_DEGR ,HOSL_SEQ0 ) )
WITH T1 (C1, C2) AS ( SELECT 'CORP_CODE','법인코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'COME_CODE','공법' FROM DUAL ) SELECT * FROM T1
